subject: Welsh Parliament election 2021
title: Welsh election results 2021: How it happened
article: After two days of counting in the 2021 Welsh Parliament election, Welsh Labour has kept control in the Senedd. Mark Drakeford,who is set to stay as first minister, has kept his Cardiff West seat with an increased majority. Labour has been in power since the birth of devolution in 1999, but has never secured a majority. It was just one seat short of creating history in Wales as the last result came in - but Mr Drakeford was happy winning half of the Senedd's 60 seats.
